oai_dc:dc.dc:title: National Boulevard and Cannon Ball Monument, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of National Boulevard and a cannon ball monument in Chattanooga, Tennessee. A horse-drawn carriage is visible on the road in the distance. Features a white border, divided back, and handwritten notes on reverse. [No. 11380]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Cannons; Cannon balls; Trees; Roads
